description:
Provide a structured interface for capturing meeting minutes linked to events and engagements. Automatically extract action items, assign them as tasks/tickets, and track completion. Support voice-to-text and AI summarization of notes.

**Rationale:** Meetings generate commitments and action items that must be tracked. Currently missing is a bridge between events and the resulting deliverables/tickets. This ensures nothing falls through the cracks after engagements with stakeholders.
title: Meeting Minutes and Action Item Extraction
